Home

About Me

Hi, I'm Sam Feldstein. I'm a human, raised by humans. I like building websites and making movie references.

I've been building websites since 2023. You can see my work on the projects page. I'm pretty happy with the progress I've made in a fairly short time, and I'm officially trying to establish a clientele.

I like building sites for individuals, small businesses, and nonprofits. If you need a developer in your life and that sounds like a good fit, send me an email.

You can read more about me on the About page.

Latest Project: Danceophile Studio (in progress)

A website for an independent folk dance studio. Built with Astro.
